person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The court convicted General Antoine Lahd , head of the South Lebanon Army ( SLA ) , of collaborating with Israel with which Lebanon is officially at war .

Let's think step by step.

1. General Antoine Lahd
2. Head of the South Lebanon Army (SLA)
3. Court
4. Lebanon
5. Israel
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. General Antoine Lahd
2. General Antoine Lahd (Head of the South Lebanon Army)
3. Court
4. Israel
5. Lebanon

(Note: In this context, "Court" can be considered a person or an entity, depending on the specific legal context. Here, I assumed it to be a person for the sake of simplicity.)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| General Antoine Lahd |
| Head of the South Lebanon Army (SLA) |
| Court |
| Israel |
| Lebanon |
